snippet: The Bharatiya Janata Party, coming off a huge victory in May’s parliamentary elections, did poorly in by-elections in three northern states.
abstract: India's Bharatiya Janata Party, coming off huge victory in May parliamentary elections, suffers political setback with poor showing in state legislative by-elections in three northern Indian states.
lead_paragraph: The Bharatiya Janata Party, coming off a huge victory in May’s parliamentary elections, did poorly in by-elections in three northern states.

headline.print_headline: India: State Elections Are Setback for Governing Party
